title: Making a Team (Practices/Tournaments)
body: Hello everyone, My name is Thiago Gomes Casali, IGN: UTC TcasaIi. My friend and I are looking to make a team. We are looking for players Gold + . We are going to be practicing at least 3 times a week and we will be playing online tournaments. If you are interested make sure to add me on League or comment on this discussion.

Eastern standard time zone

Main: {{champion:98}} , {{champion:150}}, and {{champion:41}} 

I have a lot of practice with team play. I'm looking to take league of legends to the next level. I'm inspired to take league all the way. I'm 17 years old and I'm available everyday unless I have family or school work. I'm on all day on the weekends and on after 3:00pm on weekdays. I'm also a graphic designer if we want to take the team to a next level. I'm open to anything. I have mostly every communications program.

P.S. I recommend you to read my post to learn more about me. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/4F6clZR6-lft-gold-elo-top-main-looking-for-a-team
